name: Man Bro Classics Collection
description:
The Man Bro's classics collection is a package of some of our most popular styles of all time. This collection is a tremendous value for your money at only $30.

The classics collection features
•1 Black front white frame with smoke lenses
•1 Clear frame with gold lenses
•1 Black frame with silver lenses
•1 White frame with gold lenses

name: Man Bro Neon Three Pack
description:
The Man Bro's Neon Three Pack is a package of three of our most popular solid colors. This includes three pairs with either silver or gold lenses and is a tremendous value for your money at only $25.

The classics collection features
•1 Neon Green Frame with Silver or Gold Lenses
•1 Neon Blue Frame with Silver or Gold Lenses
•1 Neon Orange Frame with Silver or Gold Lenses

name: Brokies
description:
Have you ever lost your Man-Bros in a tragic boating accident? Well with a fresh new set of Brokies you will never have to deal with the tragedy of watching your Man-Bros sink to the bottom of the ocean, lake, or pond again. 

The newest addition to our product line, Brokies are not only a sweet add-on for your shades but they also keep them protected because they FLOAT!

Our Brokies are made of Neoprene and are designed to fit perfectly on your Man-Bros. 

Brokies currently come in Navy Blue and boldly state "MAN BRO BRO MAN" in our signature font for all your buddies to see.

(sunglasses not included, sunglasses pictured are Matte Black Frames with Mars Lenses)

name: Matte White Frames
description:
Solid Colors (Goaltenders):

Solid color frames are referred to in the Man-Bro warehouse as goaltenders since every team needs a solid tender minding the pipes and making good decisions on clears.  Solid white frames and black frames headline this collection and are the staple in any sunglasses collection.  They are closely followed in popularity by; hazard orange, lime green, royal blue, fire engine red, and aqua/light blue and Carolina blue.

ALL Man-Bros are UV400 rated (that's 100% protection from UV rays).  So no worries bros, get back to thinking about how fresh you're gonna look.

name: Matte Black Frames
description:
Solid Colors (Goaltenders):

name: Black Front Lime Green Frames
description:
Black Fronts (Middies):

Formerly known as neon arms, black front shades have black fronts (surprise) and colored arms.  Black fronts are referred to as middies for their dual role as offensive and defensive players and also because we carry more middies on our roster than any other position.  Business in the front and party in the back, middies are both conservative and aggressive players and must be prepared for any scenario.  Black fronts are available in; hazard orange, blood orange, red, lime green, white, royal blue, aqua/light blue, turquoise, purple, hot pink, melon, Carolina blue, and Teal.  

ALL Man-Bros are UV400 rated (that's 100% protection from UV rays).  So no worries bros, get back to thinking about how fresh you're gonna look.

name: Red Argyle Frames
description:
Man-Bro Custom (Coach)      
       
The Man-Bro custom line includes any design or patterned pair and also special edition pairs.  Coaches are integral in a team’s success and their impact is exemplified by success on man-up, man-down, set clears, offensive and defensive configurations, zone defense schemes, and setting the line-up.  Coaches have to be creative and our custom line is bustling with creativity from our argyle patterns to our special edition Ameribro pairs.  Keep a look at for the Man-Bro custom line as frames go in and out of stock without warning. 

ALL Man-Bros are UV400 rated (that's 100% protection from UV rays).  So no worries bros, get back to thinking about how fresh you're gonna look.

name: The MBBM Lax Shooter - Neon Blue
description:
Looks like cotton, feels like cotton, but it's 100% polyester!  Extremely comfortable, breathable, and keeps its soft feel and bright color through the wash.  

Available is Sapphire with White printing; Girls XS, S and Mens S, M, L, XL.

name: The MBBM Lax Shooter - Gray
description:
Looks like cotton, feels like cotton, but it's 100% polyester!  Extremely comfortable, breathable, and keeps its soft feel and bright color through the wash. 

Grey with Navy Blue printing; Men's S, M, L.

name: White Front Blue Curacao Frame
description:
White Fronts (Attack)

Launched in 2012, white fronts have been battling clears fronts since day to become the flyest line of man-bro’s available. White fronts are flashy and smooth, which is how we like our attackmen/women. The original white front, the ALL white frame, is the most popular man-bro frame of all time and is the leader of the offense. Arm options include; Blue, Teal, Pink, and now Blue Curacao.

ALL Man-Bros are UV400 rated (that's 100% protection from UV rays). So no worries bros, get back to thinking about how fresh you're gonna look.

name: Man Bro Variety Pack
description:
The Man Bro variety pack has something for everyone. At a price of only $25 this pack is truly a door buster. The variety pack includes:

-1 white clearie frame with smoke lenses
-1 black front carolina blue frame with gold lenses
-1 white front teal frame with gold lenses
-1 black front purple frame with smoke lenses

name: Clear Front Neon Blue Frames
description:
Clear Fronts (Defensemen)

Formerly known as clearies, clear fronts boast colored arms and have been insanely popular since inception in 2011.  Clear fronts are known as defensemen as we believe that long poles are instrumental in a successful clear.  They need to be able to launch the ball accurately from sideline to sideline, dodge riders, and often times carry the ball across midfield and distribute the ball forward themselves.  No one messes with d-men and no one messes with the clear front line.  Arm options include; white, hazard orange, lime green, blue, red, purple, hot pink, turquoise, and the infamous ALL clear.

ALL Man-Bros are UV400 rated (that's 100% protection from UV rays).  So no worries bros, get back to thinking about how fresh you're gonna look.
